alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Knox; Wichita; Wilbarger (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 4:02PM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Accumulating snow, sleet, and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches are possible in northwest, northern, central, and southwestern Oklahoma, and western north Texas. Locally higher snow amounts up to 8 inches will be possible. Ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch or more in portions of south central and southeastern Oklahoma. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern, northern, central, and southern Oklahoma, and portions of western north Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Power outages will be possible, especially across portions of southern and southeastern Oklahoma. The cold wind chills as low as 10 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Oklahoma, call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7 for road information. In Texas, call 8 0 0 4 5 2 9 2 9 2 for road information.
